content.detailedDescription: I was on my front deck having coffee when i noticed a large bright white light off to the sw about 10 degrees above the horizon. when i really focused on it i could see a "cone" shaped vapor trail emitting form behind the object (like a rocket when it blows of the 2nd. stage). the object seemed to slightly change in flight direction, it appeared  to slowly drift from s to sw and back again a few times. then it turn to the west and vanished leaving a visible vapor trail of this "s" pattern or possibly "cork screw" pattern in the sky. see attached pictures of vapor trail
content.summary: Large bright object with a vapor cone, flight path deviatons, then vanished to nw of my location

content.detailedDescription:
My sister was driving down the highway heading home when these three (3) lights appeared. they "flew" in and almost hovered. she pulled over to take a quick picture, as soon as she looked away the lights vanished. she continued driving home. 

when she got home and reviewed the picture, she noticed the huge crescent shaped object on the right of the picture. she said that she didn't know if it was window glare or not. the lights made no noise. 

she said she was really excited about what she might be seeing.
content.summary: Driving down highway, saw the 3 lights and tried to take a quick photo. looked away and it was gone. when photo was looked at later, saw the huge object on right

content.detailedDescription: Please just watch the video.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was glowing and it looked like a bullet, it left a cone shape cloud that glowed

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a star, then a comit, then liam's a search helicopter, then dissolved into space
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like a star, then a comit, then liam's a search helicopter, then dissolved into space

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i just turned off the lights in the house.  we sat on the couch and noticed lights on the north wall in the room.  my husband got up to look out of the curtains to see who was driving by, as we did not hear any noise.  he asked me to get his binoculars as he noticed lights in the trees trip east of the house.  i gave him the binoculars and he focused to the lights.  he commented what the check is that.  he asked me too look.  it looked like a sphere with lights on top and bottom.  i gave him the binoculars and sat on the couch.  he stated the lights were dimming and the object gave off a glow.  he asked if the doors were locked and i told him yes.  he continued to watch the object.  at 10:30 pm he sat on the couch. i got up and looked outside.  the lights were dim and the object continued to stay on the ground.  our cats write acting wild when this first started and they calmed down.  we lost sight if the object when the lights went black.
content.summary: Seen ufo on ground east of house.  two layers of lights and object was a sphere.
Spaceship and ailien near by me

content.detailedDescription: I and my 2 children seen a ufo this evening. its feb.13,2017. the time was 9:10 p.M i noticed a very bright light in the sky. at first i thought it was a star. then i thought maybe a planet. i never noticed that light there before. so i grabbed the binoculars and could not believe what i was seeing! it was bright. it had colours. it has designs. first it was just hovering and still. after a bit, it start rotating over and over. i seen what looked to be windows;tons of them. way more than what i seen in pictures. i showed both my kids what i was seeing so they could witness what i was seeing. i don't have a camera so i didn't take a pic. even if i had taken a pic though, i bet it just would have looked like a bright light cause seeing what we seen through the binoculars was so different from what we seen with our bare eyes. eventually the ufo began to descend down. below the ufo was the university. this university sits on burnaby mountain.The ufo appeared to land to the right of the red light that is on that mountain located there. that was the end of that. the whole episode lasted for approximately 20 minutes. it was awesome. my adrenaline lasted all night!
content.summary: Seen a bright light in the sky. got my binoculars. see the ufo  with all its coulours and lights. cool design on it. tons of lights for windows(seen that kind of thing in pictures before but this had way more. i showed my 2 kids. no pic cause no camera :(

content.detailedDescription: Walking with friends. object zig zagged. stopped. i said look. everyone saw it. it moved toward us rub away. i said its going to go. and it took off. got back to house. it reappeared. more people saw. i snapped photo.
content.summary: Several witnessed first observed on playground. then mins later. xigzagvpattern.

content.detailedDescription: My oldest brother had brought a scanner home from work and i was listening to it and he said, why don't you go up on the roof of our house and you will get better reception. i went outside and climbed up the ladder and got on the rooftop . as i set there listening i looked up slightly and saw something coming toward me a little to the left of me in the sky. it kept moving toward me and i saw the round shape and dome of it and it had pulsating lights of different colors around the bottom. i thought, what in the world and then i realized what i was seeing. it came to a complete stop and just set there above the houses. i actually pinched my self and thought this is real. at the same time i heard voices of a man on the ground talking to someone in a plane on the scanner. the person on the ground asked the person in the plane if he had seen anything strange up there and the guy in the plane said, i sure have and it just passed right in front of me and i'm landing this plane now. the ufo then started moving straight back in the direction it came from. what shocked me also about it was that a sound never came from it. i was very shook up and climbed back off of the rooftop and went in the house. i didn't tell my family until the last few years because i didn't think they would believe me. i don't know why but i looked in the paper the next day and there was a small article that said that the sheriffs dept. had received about 500 phone calls reporting a ufo being seen. i didn't call because i didn't figure they would believe me and also thought, what can they do about it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sitting on housetops listening to a scanner. happened to look up and it was moving toward me  at treetop level about 5 miles an hour.

content.detailedDescription:
Now let me start off by saying that this vehicle could very well be a secret military experimental aircraft. 
here is my story and what i witnessed.
i am a truck driver, i was on my way from san bernardino ca to las vegas nv. it was around 11 pm on thursday, february 9th, at that time i was in between baker and primm california heading north on i-15. after some time i had noticed that there wasn't any traffic heading south on i-15 for at least 5 minutes. i just figured that there must be an accident on the other side but a few minutes later as i was cresting a hill here comes the highway patrol with all their lights on driving somewhere between 80-100mph with the military in tow. they were all escorting a single flatbed trailer with an incredible somewhat triangular shaped ufo like vehicle on the trailer. it was much wider than the trailer and had 3 sets of landing gear in which it stood upon. it was also covered in a shrink-wrap like material. it had markings on it but none looked familiar (no american flag or numbers that i could see). the color of the material it was covered in was light grey,dark grey and black. i desperately tried to get my phone out of the car dock to try and get a picture but wasn't fast enough. behind the truck carrying the object was more military vehicles and then about a half mile or so behind them were more state troopers keeping traffic back. i've seen many different ufo pictures and this object was close to being similar to the tr-3 but it's edges were much more rounded and wider. i really wish i could have gotten a picture of it, but then again i'd probably have the military or some men in black paying me a visit.
content.summary: Police escorted military vehicles with incredible ufo like vehicle being transported under the cover of darkness

content.detailedDescription:
Video was taken on my cell phone, from my front stoop, on a bright, sunny afternoon. i’m near a lake and river, so i'm used to seeing large birds, like herons. unless the distance was greater than i thought, i don't think this was a bird.
i noticed this object moving from my right to left, ne to n basically, at a slow, but steady speed. it made no noise that carried to my position. my first thought was that it was a drone, due to the spherical shape, slow rate of horizontal travel, etc. there also appears to be either some spinning upon its own access or fluttering (perhaps bird wing flapping) motion. the object was 200 - 400 feet above the horizon, and perhaps 1/2 – 3/4 mile from my vantage point.
i've never been unable to determine to which basic real-world category an observed object belongs, which is why i thought it might be a drone. i've never seen a drone in flight, in person, from a distance. i don't think it's anything other than something mundane, but would like to know your opinion(s).
content.summary: Daytime video of a solid, white object that i can't easily identify. drone, bird, balloon perhaps?

content.detailedDescription: I love taken photos of moon. had a nice daytime photo of moon and took some pics. put disk in computer and adjusted photos. normal pics you could not see objects. a few days later i was playing with exposure and noticed objects by accident.
content.summary: Taking pics of daytime moon. normal pic exposure can't see objects. played with exposure of pics then objects were spotted.

content.detailedDescription: What did i just see in the western sky?  was taking out trash & thought it was an airplanes landing lights.  went back out about 5 min later & it was still there in roughly same spot.  super bright, too bright for a star.  got out my crappy binoculars & it was kind of egg shaped, white and green with dots or spikes all over.  tumbling at times as if you could only see the facing edge.  it was close enough to see it rotating about once every 5 seconds.  i watched it from about 8 till about 9:15.  it has gone over the horizon.  ufo, comet, asteroid, space junk, venus?  i called news & police & they had no reports & google has not provided an answer yet.  any ideas?
content.summary: Bright object, as bright as plane landing lights when first observed.  could see rotation about once every 5 sec.  like a tumbling object

content.detailedDescription: Just was looking at the moon with my wife friday night and saw an orb flying around it and took these pics. no clue what it could be, just couldn't believe what i was seeing.
content.summary: Orb around the moon then takes off and disappears with a ring of reddish stuff

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside of my college cafeteria when i saw bright red orange lights appear in the sky. knowing i had seen them last year i called my friend and ran to our apartment. she ran outside and we stood in the yard waiting for the lights to return. as we stood there we could identify white blinking lights in the sky that i identified as the lights i had seen, but now spread out and dim in the sky. we stared at the sky for about 20 minutes until finally it reappeared again. toward the south east a straight line of red orange lights spread out in a straight line and then faded into nothingness. this happened 2 more times and then once in a diagonal pattern. one light smoothly became 7 in an astounding transition. i was incredibly excited to know my friend had finally seen these lights as well. it's one thing to see it for yourself and tell the story, it's another entirely for others to share in your experience. after several minutes of waiting for the lights to return, we grudgingly went back inside.
content.summary: Strange red orange lights spread out in a straight line several times across the sky. white blinking lights were also surrounding the area.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck observing star clusters with a pair of astronomy binoculars (25x100). spotted a +3 magnitude pseudo-star just north of castor and pollux (gemini), right in front of me and nearly overhead. the object wandered slowly toward ursa major. when it was about 5 degrees west of the cup of the big dipper, it paused, then brightened intensely (as bright as sirius!). by the time the object got to the cup of the big dipper i was following it through my binoculars. after it became intensely white, it shot like a jet and flew away at tremendous speed, disappearing from view in just two seconds. (i had a clear view of the horizon.) it had taken off due north. i have seen many pseudo-stars in my area, and nearly all go due north when leaving the area. the pseudo-stars usually look like normal stars through binoculars and telescopes, but i have previously photographed some of them and seen a craft structure. this one brightened so much when it took off, even a non-astronomer would have known this was no ordinary star. unfortunately it is still cold here, and i didn't have a camera available to get a photo of this one.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Psuedo-star spotted moving just north of castor & pollux, moved toward big dipper, brightened immensely and took off due north.

content.detailedDescription: Location: staten island n.Y. 10305 zip code. weather: very low cloud cover and clear sky. eyes were immediately drawn to a bright single white point of light moving quickly in the sky above the clouds. it was a steady speed, solid light and no sound. light was traveling in the direction of the ocean and object just disappeared. total event lasted 40 seconds.
content.summary: Very bright single white point of light moving quick.

content.detailedDescription: Was leaving to work earlier than usual because i had a longer commute to a jobsite about 4:15 am, when i was about to drive onto a main road leaving my community i saw several lights hovering and changing form and position repeatedly. at first t thought they could be helicopters but one of the changes in movement was what i can describe as swirling downwards leaving a sort of a tail and then regaining its initial position rapidly, this was performed randomly by each one of them and that's when i thought it was strange and started to record video with my phone. in the video i was able to capture a portion of this movement before losing visual contact due to trees in the horizon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Several lights hovering all changing direction randomly until lost over tree tops

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was home watching tv when my mom looked out the window 

2) mom called me then i went to smoke a cigarette and saw the object

3) i thought it was a star or planet 

4) bright white glowing light brightening and dimming over and over again the it would move then hoover, again fading in and out it's been happen for about a week

5) i was awstruck and confused and excited all at once now i am just wanting answers i know we are not alone but to actually confirm it was a ufo would be awesome 

6) length just figured it would be there if not then it would come back..
content.summary: Been a repeated pattern last week or so a blinking white light in sky brightening then dimming then brightening again

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture yesterday because the craft appeared to be moving vertically and it caught my eye. my lens was dirty, but the image is good quality. i am sure it is just a regular aircraft, but i am curious and hope to get some feedback on it.
content.summary: Aircraft

content.detailedDescription: In approximately 1975-76, on county rd 16 in dodge county, while heading north just short of county rd r, at night, my mother and i noted a row (50 feet +/-) of amber lights which appeared to be just part way up the bluff in front of us and just to the east of the road. we both commented something like "i didn't know there was a house there".  our observation was casual and lasted for maybe 30 seconds. we then realized the next day that there was no house there. the bluff begins its rise about about 5500 feet north of where we were and it rises about 125 feet over the course of about 2000 feet. i believe it was during cooler weather, as i don't think we had our car windows down. we turned west onto county rd r and didn't think another thing about it until, as i said, the next day. we both saw something, something that was not there before nor immediately after, as no structures were built near to there until 30 years later.
content.summary: When i was about 15 years old, my mother and i were driving near our farm and we observed amber colored lights nearby.

content.detailedDescription:
I remember this event clearly as my middle sister was in labour with her first child.

i was 21 at the time (there have many events prior and since this, but we can discuss this at a latter time) - i was in bed asleep when i suddenly woke up feeling afraid and fearful.  all the lights in the street had gone off

ever since i was a child, i have always had to have a light on to sleep.

i looked out of my window and saw the whole town (for as far as i could see) was completely black - i panicked 

i had no source of light, my heart was racing - i went back to bed, closed  my eyes and tried to sleep

must have been 10-15 minutes later i heard a buzzing and a whirring sound

i have heard this many times before and knew what was going to happen next.

my body became ridged (even my tongue was ridged and numb - which i common this type of experience), i tried to move my body, but i was unable to move.  i tried to call for help ( as my parents bedroom was nearby ) but i was unable to speak or open my mouth.

suddenly there were hands grabbing my arms, legs and around my chest. i was thrusted into the sir and towards the ceiling.

i tried to struggle free and cry out 'no! i don't want to go!'

but i couldn't move and unable to speak or open my mouth.

i remember going up and feeling the ceiling going through my body. - i can remember how it felt and it's texture.  which really had to explain in written form.

as i started to pass through the  was suddenly released and fell back down through the roof and ceiling and landing hard onto my bed.  the velocity was so great the my bedding flew up around me.

in the morning, i told my late mother what had happened - there were no marks on my hand or legs.   however, when we inspected my sternum there were clear finger marks.  when my mother inspected my back there  were 2 fingerprints (were my shoulder blades meet) that looked like thumbprints)

i tried to reach my back to prove i couldn't touch the
content.summary: Was grabbed from my bed, whilst asleep

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were walking on the beach near the fontaine bleu hotel in miami beach when we both stopped suddenly due to the appearance of a wingless aircraft hovering approximately 20 - 25 yards in front of us at a height between 30 - 60 feet up. 

we both stopped and looked at each other and when we turned back to the aircraft, it was no longer there. it disappeared as mysteriously as it appeared. i turned to my friend to ask him if he had seen what i just saw and he confirmed that yes, he did see a silver, cigar-shaped wingless aircraft that mysteriously arrived and vanished into thin air. 

i've since lost contact with my friend years ago since this happened back in 1986 but i wanted to get it out there since i know what i saw and the memory is as vivid now as it was then.
content.summary: A wingless aircraft in the shape of a cigar or cylinder hovered approximately 25 yards in front of us then disappeared.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in bed,awake the time was 0509 i saw thes bright lights that came into view from my rear window of bedroom i just knew it was a ufo it was hugeit was flying about 1000/1500 feet no more than that it was fully lit with what i can only think of white laser lights as it had 100s of them all over at first it looked like a huge dome as it passed from right to left it changed its pitch and i could see it was a huge triangle it was silent and seemed to drift in a slow curve it reached well over to the left of the end houses it then all lit up into a bright beautiful green then it went to this fantastic colour of blue i went to the front of my bedroom but it was gone i felt saddened it was a brilliant experience..I got back in bed couldnt settle and another small round ufo appeaered lit up in white like laser lights with a cross on it or plus sign this flew passed then back then flew away in the direction of the big triangle then 10 mins later another one flew by it was an orb that was white then to orange.. i am not bothered what people believe i saw what i saw its possible i might have something on my ipad but i dropped it i was so excited my brain did not function as i also have a phone camera as well but unbelievably about 2.5 hours had past that seemed like 20 minutes it was all ive ever believed in it was wonderful experience
content.summary: An amazing lifetime life changing incident

content.detailedDescription: To  fufon  call  me  up  so  you  can  put  the  right information  in this  box.
content.summary: 1st ufo large white  shap  bell  type  2ed ufo  small disk shape hover then  left at  hi - speed  at  mark-10  going  north

content.detailedDescription:
From our porch we saw a bright fire ball lasting around ten minutes first i thought it was a lighthouse but that is not true
the shape stayed constant but appeared to get closer maybe or the fire got larger
i felt like it was a ufo at first sight n the more me n friend observed it the more certain i was
i turned away for a couple of minutes n it was still there
i watched it again for a few minutes then looked away for a few minutes n it was gone
that felt kinda spooky like it was observing me n it gives me goose bumps now
content.summary: Appeared n just sat there like a burning fire for about ten minutes n never seemed to move

content.detailedDescription: While having dinner i went to take a picture of the sunset...This was in my pictures?? i also took several after with a different phone and got the same results! awesome!
content.summary: Spotted this while taking a pic of the sunset tonight in tampa??

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 9:00 pm, while i saw outside in my patio, i just happened to look to the west and a bright royal bluish colored cigar shaped object streaked across the  sky...It went by so fast, approximately 10 seconds and it disappeared. the object appeared to be somehow illuminating .
content.summary: I was outside in my back yard when i happened to lool up and saw a bright royal blue opbject spreak across from   south to north, on the western side of my house.  it disaqppeared within approximately10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: A group of four of us went on a raccoon hunt one winter night in 1969. we crossed a field and went near the top of a mountain where the dogs were trailing so we sit down and turned our lights off while the dogs done their thing. we were sitting around on the ground leaded up against tress cutting up like teenagers do when all of a sudden a large super bright round light came on like someone flipped a switch. i remember standing up and looking up and it was directly above us so bight that i couldn't make out any shape of a object it was coming from. the light had to be 100 to 150 ft dia. if not larger. someone yelled run and i ran for several hundred ft and turned around and the light was gone. we all gather back to where it happened and asked one another what the hell was that. none of us was able to identify what the light came from, but we all agreed there was no sound. we went on hunting and hunted the rest of the night. the next day my cousin who was with us asked me to go back and help him find the tubular magazine for his 22cal rifle that he lost that night. i tried to talk him out of going to look for it saying we had traveled miles so it would be impossible to find it. i finally said ok. when we got to where we saw the light we found the magazine along with all the 22 cal. bullets on the ground in a pile. one of the boys who was with us that night later became a policeman in florida and after he retired and moved back here we talked about that night and he don't remember anymore than i do. do you think hypnosis would help me recall things that might have happened after we saw the lights?
content.summary: My brother and i along with two of our friends went racoon hunting one winter night in 1969 and near the top of a mountain while were wer sitting with our flashlights turned off a bright light came on much like someone throwing a switch.No sound at all.
